cast.overview: When a childless couple--an ex-con and an ex-cop--decide to help themselves to one of another family's quintuplets, their lives become more complicated than they anticipated.
cast.title: Raising Arizona

cast.overview: It's Christmastime, and the Griswolds are preparing for a family seasonal celebration. But things never run smoothly for Clark, his wife Ellen, and their two kids. Clark's continual bad luck is worsened by his obnoxious family guests, but he manages to keep going, knowing that his Christmas bonus is due soon.
cast.title: National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation

cast.original_title: Batman: The Dark Knight Returns, Part 1
cast.overview: Batman has not been seen for ten years. A new breed of criminal ravages Gotham City, forcing 55-year-old Bruce Wayne back into the cape and cowl. But, does he still have what it takes to fight crime in a new era?
cast.title: Batman: The Dark Knight Returns, Part 1

cast.overview: Siblings Wednesday and Pugsley Addams will stop at nothing to get rid of Pubert, the new baby boy adored by parents Gomez and Morticia. Things go from bad to worse when the new "black widow" nanny, Debbie Jellinsky, launches her plan to add Fester to her collection of dead husbands.
cast.title: Addams Family Values

details.biography:
​From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.  

Sam McMurray (born April 15, 1952) is an American television, film and voice actor.

details.name: Sam McMurray
details.place_of_birth: New York City, New York, USA
